verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber also spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying תְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> te-Nu Appoint out לָכֶם֙ la-Chem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei for you cities הַמִּקְלָ֔ט <S%H4733><s%> ham-mik-Lat, of refuge אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- of which דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti whereof I spake אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem to you בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- unto you by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. of Moses

לָנ֥וּס <S%H5127><s%> la-Nus may flee שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there רוֹצֵ֔חַ <S%H7523><s%> ro-Tze-ach, That the slayer מַכֵּה־ <S%H5221><s%> mak-keh- that killeth נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh [any] person בִּשְׁגָגָ֖ה <S%H7684><s%> bish-ga-Gah unawares בִּבְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> biv-li- without דָ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> Da-'at; [and] unwittingly וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu shall become לָכֶם֙ la-Chem לְמִקְלָ֔ט <S%H4733><s%> le-mik-Lat, thither and they shall be your refuge מִגֹּאֵ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> mig-go-'El from the avenger הַדָּֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam. of blood

וְנָ֞ס <S%H5127><s%> ve-Nas And when he that doth flee אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַחַ֣ת׀ <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat unto one מֵהֶעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> me-he-'a-Rim of those cities הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, of these וְעָמַד֙ <S%H5975><s%> ve-'a-Mad shall stand פֶּ֚תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach at the entering שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar of the gate הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, of the city וְדִבֶּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-Ber and shall declare בְּאָזְנֵ֛י <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-Nei in the ears זִקְנֵ֥י־ <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei of the elders הָעִֽיר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'ir- of that city הַהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דְּבָרָ֑יו <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rav; his cause וְאָסְפ֨וּ <S%H622><s%> ve-'a-se-Fu they shall take אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To הָעִ֙ירָה֙ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'I-rah him into the city אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to וְנָתְנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-nu- unto them and give ל֥וֹ lo מָק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ma-Kom him a place וְיָשַׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-Shav that he may dwell עִמָּֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mam. among

וְכִ֨י <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi now if יִרְדֹּ֜ף <S%H7291><s%> yir-Dof pursue גֹּאֵ֤ל <S%H1350><s%> go-'El And if the avenger הַדָּם֙ <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam of blood אַֽחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav, after וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- shall not יַסְגִּ֥רוּ <S%H5462><s%> yas-Gi-ru him then they shall not deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָרֹצֵ֖חַ <S%H7523><s%> ha-ro-Tze-ach the slayer בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do; up into his hand כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki because בִבְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> viv-li- without דַ֙עַת֙ <S%H1847><s%> da-'at premeditation הִכָּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kah because he smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu, his neighbour וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and did not שֹׂנֵ֥א <S%H8130><s%> so-Ne and hated ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he ל֖וֹ lo מִתְּמ֥וֹל <S%H8543><s%> mit-te-Mol before שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <S%H8032><s%> shil-Shom. before that time

וְיָשַׁ֣ב׀ <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-Shav And he shall dwell בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> ba-'Ir in that city הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi, he עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until עָמְד֞וֹ <S%H5975><s%> a-me-Do until he stand לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָֽעֵדָה֙ <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah the congregation לַמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> lam-mish-Pat, for judgment עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until מוֹת֙ <S%H4194><s%> mOt [and] until the death הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol, of the high אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> bai-ya-Mim shall be in those days הָהֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> ha-Hem; those אָ֣ז׀ <S%H227><s%> 'az Then יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv return הָרוֹצֵ֗חַ <S%H7523><s%> ha-ro-Tze-ach, then shall the slayer וּבָ֤א <S%H935><s%> u-Va and come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his עִירוֹ֙ <S%H5892><s%> i-Ro unto his own city וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To, and unto his own house אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir unto the city אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נָ֥ס <S%H5127><s%> nas from whence he fled מִשָּֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham. they

וַיַּקְדִּ֜שׁוּ <S%H6942><s%> vai-yak-Di-shu And they appointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קֶ֤דֶשׁ <S%H6943><s%> Ke-desh Kedesh בַּגָּלִיל֙ <S%H1551><s%> bag-ga-Lil in Galilee בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount נַפְתָּלִ֔י <S%H5321><s%> naf-ta-Li, Naphtali וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁכֶ֖ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem and Shechem בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim; Ephraim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et קִרְיַ֥ת kir-Yat אַרְבַּ֛ע <S%H7153><s%> 'ar-Ba' and Kirjatharba הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he חֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ron which [is] Hebron בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in the mountain יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

וּמֵעֵ֜בֶר <S%H5676><s%> u-me-'E-ver And on the other side לְיַרְדֵּ֤ן <S%H3383><s%> le-yar-Den Jordan יְרִיחוֹ֙ <S%H3405><s%> ye-ri-Cho by Jericho מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah, eastward נָתְנ֞וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu they assigned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֶּ֧צֶר <S%H1221><s%> Be-tzer Bezer בַּמִּדְבָּ֛ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar in the wilderness בַּמִּישֹׁ֖ר <S%H4334><s%> bam-mi-Shor upon the plain מִמַּטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mi-mat-Teh out of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֑ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven; of Reuben וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רָאמֹ֤ת <S%H7216><s%> ra-Mot and Ramoth בַּגִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> bag-gil-'Ad in Gilead מִמַּטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> mi-mat-teh- out of the tribe גָ֔ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad, of Gad וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et ; גָּלֹון ga-lon כגֹּולָ֥ן <S%H1474><s%> go-Lan Golan קבַּבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> bab-ba-Shan in Bashan מִמַּטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> mi-mat-Teh out of the tribe מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh. of Manasseh

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These הָיוּ֩ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become עָרֵ֨י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei These were the cities הַמּֽוּעָדָ֜ה <S%H4152><s%> ham-mu-'a-Dah appointed לְכֹ֣ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol for all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei for all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְלַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> ve-lag-Ger and for the stranger הַגָּ֣ר <S%H1481><s%> hag-Gar that sojourneth בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cham, among לָנ֣וּס <S%H5127><s%> la-Nus might flee שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah, there כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- whoever מַכֵּה־ <S%H5221><s%> mak-keh- them that whosoever killeth נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh [any] person בִּשְׁגָגָ֑ה <S%H7684><s%> bish-ga-Gah; at unawares וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and not יָמ֗וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut, thither and not die בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad by the hand גֹּאֵ֣ל <S%H1350><s%> go-'El of the avenger הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam, of blood עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until עָמְד֖וֹ <S%H5975><s%> a-me-Do until he stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָעֵדָֽה׃ <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah. the congregation פ Peh
